channel.title: oatmeal on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in oatmeal on Praveen Lobo

item.title: Eat Oatmeal Idiots
item.description: I know, the subject is a bit harsh, but it's well suited for all comments I get from my room-mates about eating oats. Oats is one of the food that I just love. I first started having oatmeal three years ago when I came across many articles on the net. I felt like, it was made for me! Why? It's simple, easy to prepare, healthy. Believe it or not with very little or no exercise I was able to cut down all fat and lose weight just by controlling eating habits.
